patched_yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: redis-master
  namespace: default
  labels:
    name: redis-master
spec:
  serviceName: redis-master
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: redis-master
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: redis-master
        redis-master: 'true'
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: 'false'
    spec:
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      securityContext: {}
      containers:
      - name: redis
        image: redis:6.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
        env:
        - name: MASTER
          value: 'true'
        resources:
          requests:
            memory: 256Mi
            cpu: 250m
          limits:
            memory: 2Gi
            cpu: 2000m
        volumeMounts:
        - name: redis-master-volume
          mountPath: /data
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: redis-master-volume
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 10Gi

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: aplicacao
spec:
  containers:
  - name: container-aplicacao-loja
    image: rafanercessian/aplicacao-loja:v1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
    securityContext:
      readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      privileged: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: aplicacao
spec:
  containers:
  - name: container-aplicacao-loja
    image: rafanercessian/aplicacao-loja:v1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
    securityContext:
      runAsNonRoot: true
      privileged: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: aplicacao
spec:
  containers:
  - name: container-aplicacao-loja

    ports:

        cpu: 100m
        memory: 128Mi
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 256Mi
    securityContext:
      privileged: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW

        - SYS_CHROOT
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongo
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  serviceName: mongo
  replicas: 3
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      containers:
      - name: mongo
        image: mongo:stable
        command:
        - mongod
        - --bind_ip_all
        - --replSet
        - rs0
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - name: mongo-volume
          mountPath: /data/db
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo-volume
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mongo
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo
  serviceName: mongo
  replicas: 3
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo
    spec:
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      containers:
      - name: mongo
        image: mongo:stable
        command:
        - mongod
        - --bind_ip_all
        - --replSet
        - rs0
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - name: mongo-volume
          mountPath: /data/db
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - weight: 100
            podAffinityTerm:
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - mongo
          - weight: 100
            podAffinityTerm:
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - mongo
          - weight: 100
            podAffinityTerm:
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - mongo
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mongo-volume
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

metadata:
  name: mongo
spec:
  selector:

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: job-04-exec-limit
  namespace: doit-lab-02-d
  labels:
    k8s-app: job-03-exec-limit
    k8s-scope: gke-ws-doit-lab-02-d
spec:
  backoffLimit: 5
  activeDeadlineSeconds: 20
  template:
    metadata:
      name: job-04-exec-limit-tpl
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: job-04-exec-limit-c
        image: busybox:stable
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        args:
        - echo 'just running a (always failing) parallel-consumer job'; sleep 1; exit
          1;
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 3600
